column5: i was fishing the gull islands  today and lots of choppers were out that way today.  about 6 or 7 kms from were they believed they went in.  http://www.nugget.ca/webapp/sitepages/cont...ssif=News+Alert  Hope this is some closure for the family.

Geez.... Bernie, Corey, Bill and Myself were fishing that exact area not long ago.... I think I would have been ill seeing a water soaked year old decomposed human.....  hope this brings a bit of peace to the family..   any word about the reward that was offered??  Gerritt.
